name: amiram-email-service
description: Automated email service for Amiram Academy using NodeMailer and Zoho SMTP

scripts.send-welcome: node -e "const service = require('./email-service-nodemailer.js'); service.sendEmailWithLogging('welcome', process.argv[1], process.argv[2]);"
scripts.send-thank-you: node -e "const service = require('./email-service-nodemailer.js'); service.sendEmailWithLogging('thank-you', process.argv[1], process.argv[2], process.argv[3]);"

author: Amiram Academy
